## Reproducibility in the literature

-   [Reproducibility and Replicability in Science](https://www.nap.edu/read/25303/chapter/1)
-   [**Quantum computing**'s reproducibility crisis: Marjorana fermions](https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-021-00954-8)

-   [Repeatability in **Computer Science**](http://repeatability.cs.arizona.edu/)
-   [Does **Chemical Engineering** Research Have a Reproducibility Problem?](https://doi.org/10.1146/annurev-chembioeng-%20060718-030323)

-   [Ineffective antibodies](https://elifesciences.org/digests/91645/ineffective-antibodies)
-   [Prominent nanoscientist retracts paper after PhD students flagged error](https://retractionwatch.com/2023/05/09/prominent-nanoscientist-has-paper-retracted-after-phd-students-flagged-error/)
